alert.note: Alert for Central Washington Cascade Foothills; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 02 at 8:17AM PDT until August 02 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND CRITICALLY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES TODAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE WATERVILLE PLATEAU AND WENATCHEE VALLEY/FOOTHILLS OF CENTRAL WASHINGTON CASCADES... The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 3 PM this afternoon to 10 PM PDT this evening. * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 705 Foothills of Central Washington Cascades and Fire Weather Zone 706 Waterville Plateau. * Winds: West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * Relative Humidities: 9 to 16 percent. * Impacts: Any new or existing fires have the potential to spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington Cascade Foothills; Waterville Plateau
